title: Good batting Hafeez; Well played green shirts: President
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 20 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi on Sunday while appreciating Pakistan cricket team’s performance in second Twenty20 against New Zealand, particularly spoke high of Muhammad Hafeez’s batting.
Good batting Hafeez, deserved a century. Well played green shirts.
— Dr. Arif Alvi (@ArifAlvi) December 20, 2020
Hafeez, who scored 99 against 57 balls remained not-out in the inning which ended at 163 runs at loss of six wickets.
“Good batting Hafeez, deserved a century. Well played green shirts,” the president said on Twitter.
